title: ICE: assertion failure: eps.array_windows() ... rustc_middle/src/ty/context.rs:2684:9

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
`59324.rs` ### Code ```Rust trait BufMut {} struct Bytes; struct BytesMut; pub trait Future { type Item; } pub trait Service { type Response; type Future: Future; } pub trait ThriftService: Service< Response = FramingEncoded, Future = Box>>, > where F: Framing, { fn get_service( &self, ) -> &Service< Response = Self::Response, Future = Self::Future, >; } pub trait BufMutExt: BufMut { type Final; } impl BufMutExt for BytesMut { type Final = Bytes; } pub type FramingEncoded = ::EncBuf; pub type FramingEncodedFinal = <::EncBuf as BufMutExt>::Final; pub trait Framing { type EncBuf: BufMut; } pub struct SRHeaderTransport; impl Framing for SRHeaderTransport { type EncBuf = BytesMut; } pub type BoxService = Box< ThriftService< SRHeaderTransport, Response = Bytes, Future = Box>, >, >; fn with_factory(self, factory: BoxService) {} fn main() {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.66.0-nightly (db0597f56 2022-10-11) binary: rustc commit-hash: db0597f5619d5ed93feca28e61226d3581cc7867 commit-date: 2022-10-11 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.66.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.2 ``` ### Error output ``` error: `self` parameter is only allowed in associated functions --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/glacier2/fixed/59324.rs:58:20 | 58 | fn with_factory(self, factory: BoxService) {} | ^^^^ not semantically valid as function parameter | = note: associated functions are those in `impl` or `trait` definitions warning: trait objects without an explicit `dyn` are deprecated --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/glacier2/fixed/59324.rs:17:22 | 17 | Future = Box>>, | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = warning: this is accepted in the current edition (Rust 2015) but is a hard error in Rust 2021! = note: for more information, see = note: `#[warn(bare_trait_objects)]` on by default help: use `dyn` | 17 | Future = Box>>, | +++ warning: trait objects without an explicit `dyn` are deprecated --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/glacier2/fixed/59324.rs:51:5 | 51 | / ThriftService< 52 | | SRHeaderTransport, 53 | | Response = Bytes, 54 | | Future = Box>, 55 | | >, | |_________^ | = warning: this is accepted in the current edition (Rust 2015) but is a hard error in Rust 2021! = note: for more information, see help: use `dyn` | 51 ~ dyn ThriftService< 52 | SRHeaderTransport, 53 | Response = Bytes, 54 | Future = Box>, 55 ~ >, | warning: trait objects without an explicit `dyn` are deprecated --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/glacier2/fixed/59324.rs:54:26 | 54 | Future = Box>, | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = warning: this is accepted in the current edition (Rust 2015) but is a hard error in Rust 2021! = note: for more information, see help: use `dyn` | 54 | Future = Box>, | +++ warning: trait objects without an explicit `dyn` are deprecated --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/glacier2/fixed/59324.rs:24:11 | 24 | ) -> &Service< | ___________^ 25 | | Response = Self::Response, 26 | | Future = Self::Future, 27 | | >; | |_____^ | = warning: this is accepted in the current edition (Rust 2015) but is a hard error in Rust 2021! = note: for more information, see help: use `dyn` | 24 ~ ) -> &dyn Service< 25 | Response = Self::Response, 26 | Future = Self::Future, 27 ~ >; | error[E0277]: the trait bound `::EncBuf: BufMutExt` is not satisfied --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/glacier2/fixed/59324.rs:14:1 | 14 | / pub trait ThriftService: 15 | | Service< 16 | | Response = FramingEncoded, 17 | | Future = Box>>, 18 | | > | |_____^ the trait `BufMutExt` is not implemented for `::EncBuf` | help: consider further restricting the associated type | 20 | F: Framing, ::EncBuf: BufMutExt | ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ error[E0277]: the trait bound `::EncBuf: BufMutExt` is not satisfied --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/glacier2/fixed/59324.rs:14:1 | 14 | / pub trait ThriftService: 15 | | Service< 16 | | Response = FramingEncoded, 17 | | Future = Box>>, ... | 27 | | >; 28 | | } | |_^ the trait `BufMutExt` is not implemented for `::EncBuf` | help: consider further restricting the associated type | 20 | F: Framing, ::EncBuf: BufMutExt | ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ error[E0277]: the trait bound `BytesMut: BufMut` is not satisfied --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/glacier2/fixed/59324.rs:34:6 | 34 | impl BufMutExt for BytesMut { | ^^^^^^^^^ the trait `BufMut` is not implemented for `BytesMut` | note: required by a bound in `BufMutExt` --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/glacier2/fixed/59324.rs:30:22 | 30 | pub trait BufMutExt: BufMut { | ^^^^^^ required by this bound in `BufMutExt` error[E0277]: the trait bound `::EncBuf: BufMutExt` is not satisfied --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/glacier2/fixed/59324.rs:22:5 | 22 | / fn get_service( 23 | | &self, 24 | | ) -> &Service< 25 | | Response = Self::Response, 26 | | Future = Self::Future, 27 | | >; | |______^ the trait `BufMutExt` is not implemented for `::EncBuf` | help: consider further restricting the associated type | 27 | > where ::EncBuf: BufMutExt; | +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ```
